column2: "1. Spare Matoi."
"2. Kill Matoi."
"1. I came to save you."
"...<%me>, you're really too kind for your own good. "
"I was prepared to die, but you stopped...your kindness hurts, you know."
"Even though I was lost in the darkness, your voice reached me."
"...So I made it back. This is our one and only last chance. I have to see this through."
"...There's no stopping it now. [Profound Darkness] has already manifested within me."
"But, if I die right here and now, I can take it with me. No more danger. The end."
"That's why, if you can't find it in yourself to do it..."
"Then I... I..."
"Do-Don't, <%me>! You'll be caught in the blast!"
"Why can't you understand?! Don't interfere! I want this!!"
"I was given a purpose. I fought to protect everyone, without ever understanding the reason why, back then."
"...But now is different-- different from ten years ago! I think for myself!"
"I want to protect everyone. I want to protect this world they live in...No, that's not it."
"<%me>...I want to protect this world you live in. I want to protect you."
"That's...that's why I'm not afraid. I'm not afraid of anything anymore."
"...Then why are you crying?"
"Wha- What are you...!?"
"You might be a better vessel, but you are ARKS, and I am Falz."
"It's only proper for a Dark Falz to contain this Darkness, is it not?"
"1. You can't!!"
"2. You...planned this from the very start."
"...It was you who made me realize..."
"The strong will to save someone, and the actions to carry it out."
"I am content as long as she lives! I desire nothing more!"
"Awaken, Clarissa! No... Xion!"
"Let us end this perpetual cycle once and for all. Please... lend me your power."
"...Very well, <%me>."
"...Yes...this is what must be done."
"...So in the end, this is the best my past self could do."
"...This, too, is a single answer. But the answer is not singular."
"Your karmic destiny has been interwoven. A new answer lies ahead."
"Is This Reason"
"7章 あなたがうまれたそのりゆう"
